[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/externals-loading-webpack-plugin](./externals-loading-webpack-plugin.md) &gt; [ExternalsLoadingPluginOptions](./externals-loading-webpack-plugin.externalsloadingpluginoptions.md) &gt; [externals](./externals-loading-webpack-plugin.externalsloadingpluginoptions.externals.md)

## ExternalsLoadingPluginOptions.externals property

Specify the externals to be loaded. The externals should be Lynx Bundles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
externals: Record<string, ExternalValue>;
```

## Example 1

Load `lodash` library in background layer and `main-thread` layer.

```js
module.exports = {
 plugins: [
   new ExternalsLoadingPlugin({
     externals: {
       lodash: {
         url: 'http://lodash.lynx.bundle',
         background: { sectionPath: 'background' },
         mainThread: { sectionPath: 'mainThread' },
       },
     },
   }),
 ],
};
```

## Example 2

Load `lodash` library only in background layer.

```js
module.exports = {
 plugins: [
   new ExternalsLoadingPlugin({
     externals: {
       lodash: {
         url: 'http://lodash.lynx.bundle',
         background: { sectionPath: 'background' }
       },
     },
   }),
 ],
};
```
